document.full_text: students in burkina faso demonstrated in several cities to protest the deaths of a student in police custody last month and of other marchers killed in later protests, according to a local human rights group.
document.title: africa: burkina faso: protests over deaths
lines_and_colors: students in burkina faso demonstrated in several cities to protest the deaths of a student in police custody last month and of other marchers killed in later protests, according to a local human rights group.
